casebody.data:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY, Trustee
v.
Frederick B. CORNELIUS, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 3, 2017

Frederick B. Cornelius, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Pierre-Yves Kolakowski, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 104, 154 A.3d 79 (2017), is denied.
